+ The Artist!

> Hello, I'm Hayden, or [[*user HaydenSaintPascal]]. I like doing art, and I'm learning CSS to make some cool themes for the site! Infact the [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/theme:lampeter-warm theme] used on this page was made by me!
>> Feel free to send me any SCPs or tales that you thank may captivate me into making art or a theme!
@@ @@
> **EVIL AMPERSAND:** AMPERSAND ATTACK!!!!!! &&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&
